summary: DRAIN LINES UNDER THE HOOD CLOG RESULTING IN FLOODING OF DRIVER SIDE AND REAR DRIVER SIDE FLOOR.  SOAKING THE CARPET AND FLOOR MATS.  HAS BEEN "FIXED" 3 TIMES BY THE DEALERSHIP.  LAST TIME, THEY KEPT THE CAR FOR 3 DAYS, TOOK OFF THE DASH BOARD TO GET AT LINES AND IT HAS FLOODED AGAIN.  THEY HAVE NOT REPLACED ANY CARPETING OR MATS, AND ONCE AGAIN HAVE NOT CORRECTED THE PROBLEM.   *NLM
